The pooled incidence of severity and mortality were 20.2% (95% CI, 15.1-25.2%) and 3.1% (95% CI, 1.9-4.2%), respectively.

Title: Systematic review and meta-analysis of predictive symptoms and comorbidities for severe COVID-19 infection
Study population: All included studies were retrospective cohort studies in design, conducted between December 2019 and February 2020 in China, during the novel coronavirus (SARS-2-CoV) outbreak.
